post_title: FS: Cy Young Bare Hand Shows  SGC 4 (Piedmont Back)
post_content:
Asking $2,950 paypal friends and family or check. (Or goods and services if you twist my arm, but add 3.5%)
Really nice card.

Thanks for looking!
Still available for a great price.

A similar SGC 4 sold in April by Heritage went for $3,240 plus fees.
[URL="https://sports.ha.com/itm/baseball-cards/singles-pre-1930-/1909-11-t206-sweet-caporal-150-30-cy-young-bare-hand-shows-sgc-vg-ex-4/a/70002-58052.s?ic4=GalleryView-ShortDescription-071515"]https://sports.ha.com/itm/baseball-cards/singles-pre-1930-/1909-11-t206-sweet-caporal-150-30-cy-young-bare-hand-shows-sgc-vg-ex-4/a/70002-58052.s?ic4=GalleryView-ShortDescription-071515[/URL]

An SGC 3 went for $2,760 plus fees. 
[URL="https://sports.ha.com/itm/baseball-cards/singles-pre-1930-/1909-11-t206-piedmont-150-25-cy-young-bare-hand-shows-sgc-vg-3/a/50059-56101.s?ic4=GalleryView-ShortDescription-071515"]https://sports.ha.com/itm/baseball-cards/singles-pre-1930-/1909-11-t206-piedmont-150-25-cy-young-bare-hand-shows-sgc-vg-3/a/50059-56101.s?ic4=GalleryView-ShortDescription-071515[/URL]

A PSA 3.5 went for $3,360 by Robert Edward in May:
[URL="https://bid.robertedwardauctions.com/bids/bidplace?itemid=142569"]https://bid.robertedwardauctions.com/bids/bidplace?itemid=142569[/URL]
